description:
Turns out Plums is Kinokoinu`s sibling formed from its spores. Plum lives with Anzu and her mom, Tsubaki. Tsubaki used to tease Hotaru in elementary school and is also a picture book author. Hotaru decides to get a cell phone after years of refusing.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: きのこいぬのきょうだい
